metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11684 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
There is an illegal address access in the build_table function in libavcodec/bitstream.c of Libav 12.1 that will lead to remote denial of service via crafted input.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11684` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7:4.0-1
libavcodec-extra - 7:4.0-1
libavcodec-extra58 - 7:4.0-1
libavcodec58 - 7:4.0-1
libavdevice58 - 7:4.0-1
libavfilter-extra - 7:4.0-1
libavfilter-extra7 - 7:4.0-1
libavfilter7 - 7:4.0-1
libavformat-extra - 7:4.0-1
libavformat-extra58 - 7:4.0-1
libavformat58 - 7:4.0-1
libavutil56 - 7:4.0-1
libpostproc55 - 7:4.0-1
libswresample3 - 7:4.0-1
libswscale5 - 7:4.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:4.0-1').
